Header: A successful big onion harvest from the Polonnaruwa district
Content: A successful big onion harvest has been received from the Polonnaruwa district. Big onions are mostly cultivated at Elahera area. Farmers say that they have commenced harvesting and they are getting a high price of 250 rupees for a kilogram of big onions at present. Big onions have been cultivated at Saru Bima, Kottapitiya, Athar Gallewa 505 and 506 areas in Elahera. Farmers say that they receive a harvest of 4,000 to 5,000 kilograms of big onions per an acre.
